story_14_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
A boy with innocent eyes...
and a Beedrill with a poisonous stinger...
story_14_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
The contrast they create is simply sublime.
Fantastic! Just fantastic!
story_14_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Um, e-excuse me...Viola?
How much longer are you going to be
taking our pictures?
story_14_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Just a bit longer! I think I can get exactly the shot
I’m looking for if I just take a few more...
story_14_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
But the PML tournament matches are starting
soon! I still have a lot of training to do...
story_14_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Tomorrow’s the day you win all your battles and
show the world the true strength of Bug-type
Pokémon, right?
story_14_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Exactly! I’ve studied Bug-type Pokémon more than
anyone else. When we fight, it’s majestic!
story_14_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
A lot of people are afraid of them because of the
way they look, but I’m gonna show those people
how awesome Bug-type Pokémon really are!
story_14_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Oh, you looked really determined
just now! Fantastic!
story_14_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I was just thinking...I dream of being a
Bug-type Pokémon Professor one day...
and you’re a photographer.
story_14_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
We’re both Gym Leaders, but we’re about as
different as two people can get, huh?
story_14_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
All right, I finally got the shot I wanted!
Wanna start training?
story_14_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
You wanna show the world how cool Bug-type
Pokémon are, right? I think I can give you
a hand with that.
story_14_01000/2401_1001_1600_10:
With you and me together, Bugsy, we can show
the world how fantastic Bug-type Pokémon are!
story_14_01000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Bug-type Pokémon are our best friends!
Now let’s get ready to smile for all the cameras!
